ComicInfo.Title: Music Goes Round; Classic Peanut Strips; Cat Cash; How to Draw Charlie Brown
ComicInfo.Summary: Happiness is a monthly comic book series, Charlie Brown! PEANUTS came to KABOOM! last spring in their first graphic novel HAPPINESS IS A WARM BLANKET, CHARLIE BROWN. Now Snoopy and the gang are back in monthly comic books with an all new #1 issue! The series kicks off with new original stories seen here for the first time along with some of your favorite classic Peanuts Sundays strips. Featuring a cover by Charles Schulz himself! Don’t miss Charlie Brown, Snoopy, and the rest of Charles Schulz’s timeless characters every month at KABOOM!Happiness is a monthly comic book series, Charlie Brown! PEANUTS came to KABOOM! last spring in their first graphic novel HAPPINESS IS A WARM BLANKET, CHARLIE BROWN. Now Snoopy and the gang are back in monthly comic books with an all new #1 issue! The series kicks off with new original stories seen here for the first time along with some of your favorite classic Peanuts Sundays strips. Featuring a cover by Charles Schulz himself! Don’t miss Charlie Brown, Snoopy, and the rest of Charles Schulz’s timeless characters every month at KABOOM!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 16:35:51. [CVDB309542]
ComicInfo.Writer: Charles M. Schulz, Shane Houghton, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charles M. Schulz, Matt Whitlock, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Inker: Charles M. Schulz, Matt Whitlock, Paige Braddock
ComicInfo.Colorist: Alexis E. Fajardo, Bob Scott, Justin Thompson, Lisa Moore
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Alex Deligiannis, Charles M. Schulz, Matt Whitlock, Paige Braddock
ComicInfo.Editor: Adam Staffaroni, Alexis E. Fajardo, Matt Gagnon
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Frieda, Linus van Pelt, Lucy van Pelt, Pig-Pen, Schroeder, Shermy, Snoopy, Violet Gray
